ygData.subject: Re: Diety Question and a Warning
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s not something you did.  For some reason, nearly all the merchants in Kelethin view all wood elves apprehensively. I d /bug it. -- John H. Kim
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 14 May 1999 barton@... wrote:
>
> For those quick browsers of messages, here is my
> warning. I used the first level attack song alternating
> it mainly with the level 2 buff song when fighting in and
> around my home town of Kelethin. Occasionally, when I run
> back to town (NEVER still singing my attack song), a guard
> will kill me for no apparent reason. Maybe it thinks I
> attacked another PC if he or she happened to run by, but I
> really don't know. I fear that I have lost faction with
> my town, though I receive no messages about it.
> Shopkeepers now look at me apprehensively, except for my
> guild of course.

It's not something you did. For some reason, nearly all the
merchants in Kelethin view all wood elves apprehensively.
I'd /bug it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
